properties.name: Provide token for Upgrade and Downgrade (should be IROH Tenant)

properties.description:
26126 - Epic -- Downgrade and Upgrade the Lic Tier.

Prerequisite -- User Need to run from the Account which User want to Downgrade/Upgrade OrgID. for Downgrade or Upgrade User should provide the token which has permission to perform this (IROH tenant).

Downgrade to Lic Tier -- 
Verify third-party integration Module Visible or not 
Verify Third-Party System atomic or displayed or not 
Verify the count and compare with BaseLines

actions.name: Execute Python Script
actions.title: Get the Count of Third-Party and XDR flags from the ModuleType

properties.display_name: Get the Count of Third-Party and XDR flags from the ModuleType
properties.script:
data = $activity.definition_activity_02AS3UQJR5UWB5QIRgY0XR5Vcx4gn6RxtnX.output.jsonpath_queries.flags$
count_of_third_party = sum("third-party" in item for item in data)
count_of_third_party_and_xdr = sum(item == ["third-party", "xdr"] for item in data)
#print("Count of 'third-party':", count_of_third_party)
#print("Count of 'third-party' and 'xdr':", count_of_third_party_and_xdr)
print(count_of_third_party+count_of_third_party_and_xdr)

workflow.name: XDR- Verify the ThirdParty, XDR and Cisco System Atomic Counts
workflow.title: XDR- Verify the ThirdParty, XDR and Cisco System Atomic Counts

properties.name: Total System Atomic Counts
Cisco system atomic baseline count
Third party system atomic baseline count
XDR system atomic baseline count

properties.description:
Defect 26144

pre-requisite :

While running this WF , User Prompt with Variable , where he need enter the Count of the records , that can be get from the below query. 

execute below command in MangoDB Compass and get the Baseline count of results. then updated count while running automation. 

{owner:"system","properties.atomic.is_atomic":true,$and:[{"metadata.flags":{$ne:null}},{"metadata.flags":{$in:["third-party"]}}]} -- This will Fetch the records flags having third-party

{owner:"system","properties.atomic.is_atomic":true,$and:[{"metadata.flags":{$ne:null}},{"metadata.flags":["xdr"]}]} -- This will Fetch the records flags having only XDR 

{owner:"system","properties.atomic.is_atomic":true,$and:[{"metadata.flags":{$eq:null}},{"metadata.flags":{$nin:["third-party","xdr"]}}]} -- This will Fetch the records Does not having flags 

{"properties.atomic.is_atomic":true,owner:"system"} -- This Will Fetch the records for Atomic which are created by System Owner
properties.display_name: XDR- Verify the ThirdParty, XDR and Cisco System Atomic Counts

properties.script:
data = $activity.definition_activity_02AJOS6THXAG32kU2W6DGarkPmuEUmidhxc.output.jsonpath_queries.Flags$
count_of_third_party_and_XDR = sum(item == ["third-party","xdr"] for item in data)
print(count_of_third_party_and_XDR)

actions.name: Execute Python Script

properties.display_name: Execute Python Script to fetch Flag having Only XDR
properties.script:
data = $activity.definition_activity_02AJOS6THXAG32kU2W6DGarkPmuEUmidhxc.output.jsonpath_queries.Flags$  
count_of_only_xdr = sum(item == ["xdr"] for item in data)
print(count_of_only_xdr)

actions.name: Execute Python Script
actions.title: Calculate the Count for WF which does not have XDR Flag

properties.display_name: Calculate the Count for WF which does not have XDR Flag
properties.script:
# Sample strings
str1 = "$activity.definition_activity_02ALS9TW0F91V3Bj2e8F2QCqE1TuVej41JQ.output.jsonpath_queries.Total_Count_Syatem_Atomic_WF$"
str2 = "$activity.definition_activity_02ALUBU7H50JW2vkR3HATkblaWqQ1AjrSos.output.response_body$"
str3 = "$activity.definition_activity_02AJP4BUUZWLL3lH7NGRp6SnCR88Z8Hg2fA.output.response_body$"

# Convert strings to integers and perform subtraction
Count_for_Atomic_Having_NoFlags = int(str1) - int(str2) - int(str3)

print(Count_for_Atomic_Having_NoFlags)
